channel.title: Cdn on Nomad's reflections
channel.description: Recent content in Cdn on Nomad's reflections

item.title: CDN image hosting for blog'
item.description: It’s rare that a blog has 0 images. Hosting them on the same box as the blog instance is the easiest solution, but it comes at a cost: disk space and page load speed. Unless you are a professional blogger, you are also not ready shell out many $$ for a CDN, so what options are there?
